argument.name: mimeType
argument.description: Mime type object represents (i.e. text/html for example)

argument.name: data
argument.description: Data for object (html would be a character, a PNG image would be binary).

description.p: Returns a mime object, recognized by layouts to set extended types for variable and calculated fields.
The object contains the fields 'mime_type' and 'content'. If your 'content' is a string (i.e. HTML/SVG vs PNG/BMP) then the ToString() function can be used on the object.
